17.1.hd_quote: The energy to sustain a broad spectrum of stimuli.
17.1.behavioral_axis: Collects diverse inputs; forms many preliminary opinions.
17.1.shadow_axis: Aesthetic bias; only entertains pleasing subjects and ignores the rest.

17.2.hd_quote: The benefit of associations based on highest values.
17.2.behavioral_axis: Aligns with high-value people and ideas; filters noise.
17.2.shadow_axis: Projects superiority; tries to impose opinions rather than serve.

17.3.hd_quote: The awareness that the best road is not necessarily the most interesting.
17.3.behavioral_axis: Moves opinions toward substantiating detail for testing.
17.3.shadow_axis: Shortcutting details; weakens the case and blocks experimentation.

17.4.hd_quote: The ability to probe and discover the underlying motivation and resources of those who wish to follow.
17.4.behavioral_axis: Understands peopleâ€™s motives and places them within the pattern.
17.4.shadow_axis: Over-accepts followers; susceptibility to manipulation or misuse.

17.5.hd_quote: The recognition, however understood, that there is no end to hierarchies.
17.5.behavioral_axis: Sees nested hierarchies; leverages networks to propagate sound opinions.
17.5.shadow_axis: Becomes politicized or dependent on status; groupthink.

17.6.hd_quote: Perfected following, one with and the same as perfected leading.
17.6.behavioral_axis: Embodies service so fully that following and leading merge.
17.6.shadow_axis: Withholds opinions unless implementation is assured; can appear aloof or arrogant.
